name: Mandrun
description:
Escape the witch's recipe book and make it out of her house in time! Careful tho, you're still rooted to your pot, the witch could pull on it. Also, mandrake stew is her favourite, but her vision is pretty bad, maybe disguising as a potted plant would help you avoid her for a little while?


Instructions:

  1. Extract the zip
  2. Launch the Application
  3. Profit!

Note: Alt+Tab when launching to show the mouse (only at launch) :p

Controls:
  • A,D = Move
  • Space = Jump
  • E = Pot/Unpot

Credits: 

  • Luureii - Art (2D/3D)
  • UnspentTuna - Art (3D)
  • Appuru Nashi - Prog
  • CGrail - Music
